name: Flesh of the Machine
description:
Multiplayer Bullet Hell game made for Winter Break Bullet Hell Jam 2022-2023

Infiltrate the enemy base, set up defenses for our base, and...

GO STEAL THOSE SECRETS!

Dodge bullets, play cards and try to outlast the enemy!

Story Forward:

~~~

World peace was finally achieved on the planet of Gadelea. Nuclear war heads disarmed, Militaries dissolved and skies fluorescent blue from it's shining future; One country failed to get the memo.

Every country is controlled by one company to oversee it's people safety. Tswake however has two factions still vying for control; Secretary of Assault Captain Jem Lance with her clones and automatons of Black Enoch and Dr. Von Sagata with his mutants and machines of flesh of Sagata Corp. crash and mar each other with devious plans of cooperate espionage and brute force.

Jasper-Luke with her red bike are loyal to Black Enoch til death! And Black-Jack with his blue racer is loyal to Sagata as long as his pockets are deep enough.

Who will win this desperate struggle of control for the final piece of the planet yet laid claim? A Captain with a chip on her shoulder? Or a Mad Man?

~~~

Jubilant Orange Team:

  • Art/Story by OmegaTraid https://twitter.com/OMEGAtri | https://omegatriad.itch.io
  • Music/SFX by Paul Lanciani https://www.composerlanciani.com/  | https://paullanciani.itch.io | https://open.spotify.com/artist/0BH0UMr5GXfodE324dl9JW?si=sZTmSOKNRJq5ljKSVlz_PA
  • Programming/Gameplay concept by sitton76 https://twitter.com/sitton76 | https://sitton76.itch.io

This game is best played with joystick controllers, while keyboard controls can be used it is not the most comfortable way to play this game.

For control reference, please look at Controls.txt included with the game files.

For list of external used assets please look at Used_asset_list.txt included with the game files.

This game is a prototype, and we may develop it into a full game in the future.

Made in Godot 3.5, builds available for Windows(x64) and Linux/X11(x64)

Please do not redistribute.
